# eo-mosaics

Create mosaics


Example:

    docker run -it eom sentinel2_l1c ndvi_greyscale "POLYGON((-6.3777351379394 52.344188690186, -6.3780784606933 52.357234954835, -6.3552474975585 52.357749938966, -6.3561058044433 52.345218658448, -6.3777351379394 52.344188690186))" 2019-01-01 2019-12-31
